valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 7 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 8 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: New low moving rather quickly northeast, expected Skagerrak 988 by midday tomorrow. Low Rockall 983 losing its identity

Occasional rain.
